description: “Yes, it sounds expensive, but how should he know?” the “Late Show” host said. “He’s never bought a book.”
title: Stephen Colbert Is Not Paying $99 for Trump’s New Book
title_page: Stephen Colbert Is Not Paying $99 for Trump’s New Book - The New York Times
maintext:
Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night’s highlights that lets you sleep — and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.
Dear Donald
Donald Trump has a new book coming out: “Letters to Trump,” a collection of missives he’s received from public figures over the last 40 years.
The price? A mere $99. Stephen Colbert says it’s part of Trump’s “insatiable need for cash and external validation.”
